content: flower mini pouch is small mini pouch that can use as bag charm and earbuds pouch this pattern also suitable for stash busting because using small yardage yarn **size measurement** pouch opening diameter is 8cm and pouch deep 8 5cm this dimension of the flower petal part only **material** any fingering yarn cc1 for drawstring and flower petal part is 50 m cc2 for stem and leaf is 20 m **needle and notions** size 3 50 mm double pointed needle or 80cm circular needle if using magic loop method stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving the end **gauge** 12 stitches and 18 row per 5cm x 5cm in stockinette stitches > **special technique** > > kitchener stitches like used in grafting toes part in cuff-down socks knitting
